description: The WikiPage model object represent a single user managed wiki page.

id.description: The ID of this wiki page.

createdOn.description: The timestamp when this page was created.

createdBy.description: The id of the user that created this page.

modifiedOn.description: The timestamp when this page was last modified.

modifiedBy.description: The id of the user that last modified this page.

parentWikiId.description: When set, the WikiPage is a sub-page of the indicated parent WikiPage.

markdownFileHandleId.description: The file handle id for the file that contains the markdown.

attachmentFileHandleIds.description: The list of attachment file handle ids of this page.
